selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer in the required format.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_text_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract text from an image using OCR.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A list of strings representing the text found in the image.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_volume_markings
new_skill_specs.purpose: Interpret the largest volume marking from a list of text strings.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The largest volume marking as a float.
